title: SONOS font id - sans serif
content:
Looking for an ID on the classic looking sans serif used for SONOS

Many thanks in advance for any help,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042614im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sonos-logo_6548.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sonos-logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042614/http:/typophile.com/files/sonos-logo.jpg) | 291.59 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: Looks like some version of Poynter from Font-Bureau to me.

|SONOS| is proving most difficult, mostly due to the angle of the terminals on the |S|. Didn’t find a spot-on match. It could be a modified version of one of these typefaces:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042614/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/")  
 [http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Nobel\_rdrct.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042614/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Nobel_rdrct.html "http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Nobel\_rdrct.html")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042614/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/")  
 [http://www.typography.com/fonts/verlag/overview/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042614/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/verlag/overview/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/verlag/overview/")

The subhead appears to be Parachute’s Handbook Pro:  
 [http://www.parachute.gr/typefaces/allfonts/handbook-pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042614/http:/www.parachute.gr/typefaces/allfonts/handbook-pro "http://www.parachute.gr/typefaces/allfonts/handbook-pro")
